entry.title: Montana governor’s son one of many lobbying against anti-trans bills

link.title: Montana governor’s son one of many lobbying against anti-trans bills

entry.content:
Post 199094 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Post removed due to framing. People found it dispiriting and spreading hopelessness, while also "punching down" on a minor. Reframing this around the son attempting to talk to his father the governor might go better. -- Brandon Blatcher
entry.summary: Post 199094 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Post removed due to framing. People found it dispiriting and spreading hopelessness, while also "punching down" on a minor.
